sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Incidental) The character may spend one Destiny Point to perform a Utility Belt incidental to produce a previously undocumented—but essential—small tool from his utility belt, satchel, or pockets, with a rarity no greater than (4). This cannot be a weapon unless the weapon has the Limited Ammo 1 quality.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Utility Belt</name> <number>TAL0001235</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-14 13:17:59</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b688906a2fbf1490e0f497eef699b642</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-14 13:17:59</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
